body_html: this is a power supply issue, I've been experiencing these problems with my workstation (which had 650W 80+) with i7 CPU & Titan X Pascal GPU (1 ssd, 16gig ram, no hdd, no extra hardware), but I had to connect another PSU to the case and feed 8 Pin power input from 2nd supply. no problems so far, but voltage fluctuations still continuing. Its better to run these machines with at least 800W+ PSU to be safe. 12V rail dancing between 11.1V (which is highly dangerous) to 12.1V.
